00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "KviQString.h"
00029 
00030 #include <QObject>
00031 
00032 class KviConsole;
00033 class KviDnsResolver;
00034 class KviIrcConnection;
00035 class KviIrcConnectionTarget;
00036 
00037 class QTimer;
00038 
00039 class KVIRC_API KviIrcConnectionTargetResolver : public QObject
00040 {
00041         friend class KviIrcLink; // upper protocol in the stack
00042         Q_OBJECT
00043 protected:
00044         KviIrcConnectionTargetResolver(KviIrcConnection * pConnection);
00045         ~KviIrcConnectionTargetResolver();
00046 public:
00047         enum Status { Success, Error };
00048         enum State { Idle, Running, Terminated };
00049 private:
00050         KviIrcConnection             * m_pConnection;       // shallow, never null
00051         KviIrcConnectionTarget       * m_pTarget;           // shallow, never null
00052         KviConsole                   * m_pConsole;          // shallow, never null
00053         Status                         m_eStatus;
00054         State                          m_eState;
00055 
00056         // Auxiliary stuff
00057         QTimer                       * m_pStartTimer;       // timer used to start the connection
00058         KviDnsResolver                       * m_pProxyDns;         // the dns object for the proxy hostnames
00059         KviDnsResolver                       * m_pServerDns;        // the dns object for the server hostnames
00060 
00061         char                         * m_pReadBuffer;
00062         unsigned int                   m_uReadBufferLen;
00063         unsigned int                   m_uReadPackets;
00064 
00065         int                            m_iLastError;
00066 public:
00067         void start(KviIrcConnectionTarget * t);
00068         // valid only after the terminated() signal
00069         Status status(){ return m_eStatus; };
00070         int lastError(){ return m_iLastError; };
00071         // causes the resolver to terminate with iLastError == KviError_operationAborted
00072         // the terminated() signal is emitted.
00073         void abort();
00074 protected slots:
00075         void asyncStartResolve();
00076         void serverLookupTerminated(KviDnsResolver *);
00077         void proxyLookupTerminated(KviDnsResolver *);
00078 private:
00079         void cleanup();
00080         void lookupProxyHostname();
00081         void lookupServerHostname();
00082         void haveServerIp();
00083         bool validateLocalAddress(const QString &szAddress,QString &szBuffer);
00084         void terminate(Status s,int iLastError);
00085 signals:
00086         void terminated();
00087 };
